name: pumpkin.Guts (2021 Revision)
description:
This is a revision of a game I made (pumpkin.Guts) for the Spooktober 2020 Game Jam for the Improve My Game Jam #14 Game jam! It's still not very great, but I'm quite happy with it because this gave me a great opportunity to practice sound effects/music in a game, so that was fun.

WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

Mouse to Aim

LMB or CTRL to Shoot

Walk into houses to earn candy (Total of 36 Houses)

Original: https://stagelily-studios.itch.io/pumpkin-guts

The Music I made for this is available for free on the downloads section!
